properties.description: The number of objects in the collection.
properties.name: length

methods.description: Displays the number of elements in the TextColumn.
methods.name: count

methods.description: Returns the TextColumn with the specified index or name.

parameters.description: The index or name. Can accept: Long Integer or String.
parameters.name: index

methods.name: item

methods.description: Returns the TextColumns within the specified range.

parameters.description: The TextColumn, index, or name at the beginning of the range. Can accept: TextColumn, Long Integer or String.
parameters.name: from

parameters.description: The TextColumn, index, or name at the end of the range. Can accept: TextColumn, Long Integer or String.
parameters.name: to

methods.name: itemByRange

methods.description: Returns the first TextColumn in the collection.
methods.name: firstItem

methods.description: Returns the last TextColumn in the collection.
methods.name: lastItem

methods.description: Returns the middle TextColumn in the collection.
methods.name: middleItem

methods.description: Returns the TextColumn with the index previous to the specified index.

parameters.description: The index of the TextColumn that follows the desired TextColumn.
parameters.name: obj

methods.name: previousItem

methods.description: Returns the TextColumn whose index follows the specified TextColumn in the collection.

parameters.description: The TextColumn whose index comes before the desired TextColumn.
parameters.name: obj

methods.name: nextItem

methods.description: Returns any TextColumn in the collection.
methods.name: anyItem

methods.description: Returns every TextColumn in the collection.
methods.name: everyItem

methods.description: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the TextColumn.
methods.name: toSource

methods.description: Returns the TextColumn with the specified index.
